page.title: 12Spernall_Leisure activities
page.content:
The following are some of the leisure activities of the people of the Spernall area.
Squash Shooting Fishing Rowing Sailing Football Rugby_watching Cricket_watching Hockey Rounders Swimming Horse riding Tennis_watching Badminton Cycle racing Motor cycling Dancing Messing with car Crib Darts Snooker Fabric printing Voluntary work Bee keeping Male voice choir Operatic society Natural history society Duke of Edinburgh award scheme Clay pigeon shooting
More leisure activities on page 11.
